name: Rushi Chaganti
introduction: Hello! I'm an AI/ML Engineer who enjoys automating tasks, building intelligent systems, and working on GenAI projects.
about: I'm an AI/ML Engineer with hands-on experience in GenAI, automation, and intelligent agent development. I specialize in Python and use tools like LangChain, Pinecone, Docker, and Selenium to build scalable and efficient solutions. I am passionate about open-source, fast prototyping, and deploying user-focused tools.

projects.title: arAIse_Web
projects.description: arAIse_Web is a platform to showcase our projects and help users easily access and understand how to use our tools and applications.

projects.title: Ketsu Check
projects.description: Developed a password strength tester using machine learning, achieving over 90% accuracy. Dockerized the app and deployed it using Streamlit.

projects.title: DocuTalk
projects.description: A Streamlit app to upload and query PDF, DOCX, PPTX files using LangChain and Ollama. Features embedding generation, query processing, and CSV data plotting.

experience.description: Tested and evaluated multiple RAG systems. Developed models using RAFT, Light RAG, and Graph RAG to improve retrieval-augmented generation performance.
Developed Selenium and Playwright automations to streamline Workday and Workable systems. Built browser agents to enhance operational efficiency.
Built a ChatGPT-powered Telegram bot for YouTube transcript summarization. Scraped and generated content from X and LinkedIn using Selenium. Optimized RAG with Pinecone.

openSourceContributions.title: AI Hawk
openSourceContributions.description: Added zip code functionality and resolved issues. Assisted users in setup and development.

openSourceContributions.title: Light RAG
openSourceContributions.description: Implemented export functionality for entities, relations, and data in multiple formats.
